title: The Fremennik Exiles/Quick guide

properties.name: description
properties.value: Items required: Mirror shield, 650+ if you still need 2 kegs of beer.

content:
This quick guide has an in-depth guide here.
It contains a more detailed description of dialogue, cutscenes, and storyline.

Details[edit | edit source]

Start point Speak to Brundt the Chieftain in Rellekka.
Official difficultyMaster
DescriptionThe Fremennik bards often sing tales of the past. Of great battles, deadly foes and heroes long gone. However, in recent years, things have been much quieter in the Province, as there’s increasingly less to sing about. All that is about to change though, as what starts off as a simple investigation soon leads to one of the greatest threats the Fremennik have ever seen.
Official lengthMedium
Requirements

No boosts allowed:

  • 65 Crafting (not boostable)
  • 60 Slayer (not boostable)
  • 60 Smithing (not boostable)
  • 60 Fishing (not boostable)
  • 55 Runecraft (not boostable)
  • Completion of the following quests:
    • The Fremennik Isles
      • The Fremennik Trials
    • Lunar Diplomacy
      • Lost City
      • Rune Mysteries
      • Shilo Village
        • Jungle Potion
          • Druidic Ritual
    • Mountain Daughter
    • Heroes' Quest
      • Dragon Slayer I
      • Lost City
      • Merlin's Crystal
      • Shield of Arrav
Items required
  • Combat equipment
  • Mirror shield
  • 2 Kegs of beer (cannot be obtained in Rellekka during quest, buy from Thora the Barkeep before starting the quest)
  • 1 Molten glass
  • 100 Astral runes
  • Pet rock
  • Fishing rod or fly fishing rod
  • Fremennik shield (this is not the tradeable Neitiznot shield)
    • Alternatively, get it from Bardur AFTER being exiled, for either 150,000 or for free using a Ring of charos (a)
    • Recommended: Rune thrownaxes to get to Bardur in the Waterbirth Island Dungeon
  • Ice gloves
  • Hammer
  • Glassblowing pipe
  • 3 Lunar bars or ores. Alternatively a pickaxe to obtain them.
  • Seal of Passage (if the elite Fremennik diaries aren't completed)
Recommended
  • 80 Combat level
  • Stamina potions
  • Moonclan teleport (tablet)s
  • Food, Monkfish or better
  • Enchanted lyre, Fremennik sea boots or other means to return to Rellekka
Enemies to defeat
  • Basilisk Youngling (level 53)
  • Basilisk (level 61)
  • Monstrous Basilisk (level 135)
  • Typhor (level 218)
  • The Jormungand (level 363)

Alternatively a [[pickaxe]] to obtain them. \n*[[Seal of Passage]] (if the [[Fremennik diaries|elite Fremennik diaries]] aren't completed)"}

Walkthrough[edit | edit source]

A disturbance in Rellekka[edit | edit source]

Items required: Mirror shield, 650+ if you still need 2 kegs of beer.

Recommended: a weapon to kill a level 53 Basilisk Youngling

  • Buy 2 kegs of beer from Thora in the Longhall before you start the quest to save time later. (bank them when you have the chance to reduce weight while running around)
  • Talk to Brundt in the Longhall to start the quest. ( 2•1)…
    2Do you have any quests?
    1Yes.
    or ( 3•1)…
    3Do you have any quests?
    1Yes.
  • Go north and talk to Freygerd in the house south of the sandpit.
  • Equip your mirror shield (to avoid taking damage and stat drain), then search the sandpit (to the north) and kill the Basilisk Youngling (level 53).
  • Pick up the Unsealed letter and read it.
  • Search the rockslide west of the house to get the Fang.
  • Search the boxes south of the house to get the Venom gland.
  • Talk to Freygerd to give her the items.
  • Return to Brundt to receive a note, read it, then talk to him again for a cutscene. ( 2)…
    2Ask about the investigation.
    or ( 3)…
    3Ask about the investigation.
  • Go southeast of Rellekka, following the dirt path, and talk to Brundt. Go through all chat options to learn how to restore V's shield. ( 1•1•2•3)…
    1Where can I find a Fremennik Shield?
    1Where can I get Lunar Glass?
    2How do I make the Polishing Rock?
    3How do I make V's Sigil?

Redeeming the exile[edit | edit source]

You can do the following sections in any order as long as you use them on each other while you have a glassblowing pipe.

Fremennik shield[edit | edit source]

Items required: Rune thrownaxe and pet rock for option 3.

Recommended: Stamina potions, food, Ring of charos (a).

  • Obtain a Fremennik shield (this is not the tradeable Neitiznot shield).
    • Option 1: Go to Waterbirth Island and kill dagannoth until they drop the shield (uncommon drop).
    • Option 2: Go to Rellekka and kill Market Guards or Warriors until they drop the shield (rare drop).
    • Option 3: Travel to Bardur deep in the Waterbirth Dungeon and wear a Ring of charos (a) to get the shield for free. Without the ring it will cost 150,000.

Lunar glass and V's sigil[edit | edit source]

Items required: Seal of passage, molten glass, 100 astral runes, any pickaxe, hammer.

  • Go to Baba Yaga on Lunar Isle to turn your molten glass into molten glass (i). ( 3)…
    3
    or ( 4)…
    4
    if using lunar spellbook and Ourania teleport is not unlocked.
  • Head north-east of the town to Lunar Isle mine and mine stalagmites for 3 lunar ore.
  • Leave the mine and travel to the Astral Altar with 100 astral runes in your inventory and craft on the altar to obtain Lunar glass. Then return to Rellekka.
    • Optional: Destroy the Seal of passage and talk to the Oneiromancer to be teleported there. This guide will remind you later to re-obtain it at a convenient moment.
  • Smelt 3 lunar bars in a furnace (Rellekka is convenient) or you can use Superheat Item.
  • Smith the V sigil on an anvil (Rellekka is convenient).
  • Talk to the Fossegrimen to enchant the sigil. (Found by summoning at the Strange altar south-west of Rellekka) ( 3)…
    3Ask about V's Sigil.
    .

Polishing rock[edit | edit source]

Items required: Pet rock, Fishing rod, V sigil (e), Lunar glass, Ice gloves, Glassblowing pipe, Fremennik shield.

Recommended: 2 teleports to the Mountain Camp (Slayer ring or Fairy rings access code AJR), a teleport back to Rellekka (Enchanted Lyre or Fremennik Sea boots)

  • Head east of Rellekka to the Mountain Camp
  • Follow the path north of the Mountain Camp and inspect the Large Geyser. Use your pet rock on the Geyser. ( 1)…
    1It's for the good of the Province!
  • Go to Rellekka and talk to Peer the Seer found southwest of the Rellekka market.
  • Return to the geyser and wear the ice gloves, if you forget you may re-equip them and try again.
  • Inspect the large geyser to the west to get the polishing rock.
  • Use any of the components together while having a glassblowing pipe in the inventory to create V's shield.

Basilisks in the Market[edit | edit source]

Items required: V's shield, combat equipment, 2 kegs of beer (If you forgot to buy them at the quest start, buy them from Rasolo or on the Grand Exchange. Keg of beer from the table in the Longhall does not work.)

This fight takes place in an instanced area.
On death, all unprotected items will be moved to a grave outside the instance. Any items left on the ground will be lost.
  • Talk to Brundt southeast of Rellekka.
    • If you destroyed your Seal of passage to return to Rellekka quickly, now is a good time to ask for another one ( 2)…
      2Ask about a Seal of Passage.
      and then talk to Brundt again.
  • Return to the Longhall and talk to Brundt again.
  • Wield V's shield and fight the basilisks until you reach 100%. You have to hit a basilisk at least once to make its death count towards completion.
    • Monstrous Basilisk (level 135) counts for 10% completion.
    • Basilisk (level 61) counts for 3.33% completion.
  • Travel on the Fremennik Boat to the Island of Stone.

Island of Stone[edit | edit source]

Items required: V's shield, combat equipment to fight Typhor (level 218) and The Jormungand (level 363), a one handed weapon (must wield V's shield)

Recommended: 1-2 super restore(4), high-healing food. Leaf-bladed battleaxe, dragon mace, or a dragon warhammer are good weapon choices as the monster is weak to crush. Note that the dwarven helmet provides the highest crush boost of all helmets, however its defences are less than that of the helm of Neitiznot.

  • Speak with Brundt to explain the cave door puzzle.
  • Solve the cave door puzzle (Mastermind).
    • Each red check means one rune is correct but in the wrong position.
    • Each green check means one rune is correct and in the right position.
 This fight takes place in an instanced area.
On death you can pay Brundt the Chieftain to retrieve any lost items. You will be charged 50,000 for this service. Should you die an unsafe death a second time before retrieving all your items, they will be lost completely.
  • Equip V's shield and keep it equipped for the full fight.
  • Enter the cave.
  • Fight Typhor (level 218)
    • Pray against either Magic or Melee, depending on which attack style you are weaker against.
  • There is a checkpoint after Typhor is defeated. You may wish to teleport out between fights to resupply. If you do, you can return to the Island of Stone by talking to Haskell on the western-most pier in Rellekka (the same one the Waterbirth Island boat is on)
  • Fight The Jormungand (level 363). There are two special attacks to avoid:
    • When the screen turns red, click to face away from the attack (hits around 40 damage and drains your stats a little).
    • When frozen in rock, click repeatedly to break free.
    • Pray Protect from Magic.
    • It is weak to crush attacks.

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • 2 Quest points
  • V's shield
  • Access to the Island of Stone
  • Ability to kill a Basilisk Knight as a Slayer Task
  • A Fremennik honorific, Dräpare, added to the player's Fremennik name
  • Ability to create and equip the Neitiznot faceguard
  • 15,000 Slayer experience
  • 15,000 Crafting experience
  • 5,000 Runecraft experience
v • d • e

rawContent:
{{Quick Guide}}

==Details==
{{Quest details page|The Fremennik Exiles}}

==Walkthrough==
===A disturbance in Rellekka===
'''Items required:''' ''[[Mirror shield]], {{Coins|650}}+ if you still need 2 [[Keg of beer|kegs of beer]].'' 

'''Recommended:''' ''a [[weapon]] to kill a level 53 [[Basilisk Youngling]]''
{{Checklist|
*Buy 2 [[keg of beer|kegs of beer]] from [[Thora the Barkeep|Thora]] in the [[Longhall]] before you start the quest to save time later. (bank them when you have the chance to reduce weight while running around)
*Talk to [[Brundt]] in the [[Longhall]] to start the quest. {{Chat option|2Do you have any quests?|1Yes.}} or {{Chat option|3Do you have any quests?|1Yes.}} 
*Go north and talk to [[Freygerd]] in the house south of the sandpit.
*Equip your mirror shield (to avoid taking damage and stat drain), then search the sandpit (to the north) and kill the [[Basilisk Youngling]] (level 53). 
*Pick up the [[Unsealed letter]] and read it.
*Search the rockslide west of the house to get the [[Fang]].
*Search the boxes south of the house to get the [[Venom gland]].
*Talk to [[Freygerd]] to give her the items.
*Return to [[Brundt]] to receive a note, read it, then talk to him again for a cutscene. {{Chat option|2Ask about the investigation.}} or {{Chat option|3Ask about the investigation.}}
*Go southeast of Rellekka, following the dirt path, and talk to [[Brundt]]. Go through all chat options to learn how to restore [[V's shield]]. {{Chat option|1Where can I find a Fremennik Shield?|1Where can I get Lunar Glass?|2How do I make the Polishing Rock?|3How do I make V's Sigil?}}
}}

===Redeeming the exile===
You can do the following sections in any order as long as you use them on each other while you have a [[glassblowing pipe]].

====Fremennik shield====
'''Items required:''' ''[[Rune thrownaxe]] and [[pet rock]] for option 3.'' 

'''Recommended''': ''[[Stamina potions]], [[food]], [[Ring of charos (a)]].''
{{Checklist|
*Obtain a [[Fremennik shield]] (this is '''not''' the tradeable [[Neitiznot shield]]).
**Option 1: Go to [[Waterbirth Island]] and kill [[Dagannoth (Waterbirth Island)|dagannoth]] until they drop the shield (uncommon drop).
**Option 2: Go to [[Rellekka]] and kill [[Market Guard]]s or [[Warrior (Rellekka)|Warriors]] until they drop the shield (rare drop).
**Option 3: Travel to [[Bardur]] deep in the [[Waterbirth Island Dungeon|Waterbirth Dungeon]] and wear a [[Ring of charos (a)]] to get the shield for free. Without the ring it will cost {{Coins|150000}}.
}}

====Lunar glass and V's sigil====
'''Items required''': ''[[Seal of passage]], [[molten glass]], 100 [[astral rune]]s, any [[pickaxe]], [[hammer]].''
{{Checklist|
*Go to [[Baba Yaga]] on [[Lunar Isle]] to turn your molten glass into [[molten glass (i)]]. {{Chat option|3}} or {{Chat option|4}} if using lunar spellbook and Ourania teleport is not unlocked.
*Head north-east of the town to [[Lunar Isle mine]] and mine stalagmites for 3 [[lunar ore]].
*Leave the mine and travel to the [[Astral Altar]] with 100 [[astral rune]]s in your inventory and craft on the altar to obtain [[Lunar glass]]. Then return to Rellekka.
**Optional: Destroy the [[Seal of passage]] and talk to the [[Oneiromancer]] to be teleported there. This guide will remind you later to re-obtain it at a convenient moment.
*Smelt 3 [[lunar bar]]s in a [[furnace]] (Rellekka is convenient) or you can use [[Superheat Item]].
*Smith the [[V sigil]] on an [[anvil]] (Rellekka is convenient).
*Talk to the [[Fossegrimen]] to enchant the sigil. (Found by summoning at the Strange altar south-west of Rellekka) {{Chat option|3Ask about V's Sigil.}}.
}}

====Polishing rock====
'''Items required''': ''[[Pet rock]], [[Fishing rod]], [[V sigil (e)]], [[Lunar glass]], [[Ice gloves]], [[Glassblowing pipe]], [[Fremennik shield]].'' 

'''Recommended:''' ''2 teleports to the [[Mountain Camp]] ([[Slayer ring]] or [[Fairy rings]] access code {{Fairycode|AJR}}), a teleport back to [[Rellekka]] ([[Enchanted lyre|Enchanted Lyre]] or [[Fremennik sea boots 4|Fremennik Sea boots]])''
{{Checklist|*Head east of Rellekka to the [[Mountain Camp]]
*Follow the path north of the [[Mountain Camp]] and inspect the [[Large Geyser]]. Use your pet rock on the Geyser. {{Chat option|1It's for the good of the Province!}}
*Go to Rellekka and talk to [[Peer the Seer]] found southwest of the Rellekka market.
*Return to the geyser and wear the [[ice gloves]], if you forget you may re-equip them and try again.
*Inspect the large geyser to the west to get the [[polishing rock]].
*Use any of the components together while having a [[glassblowing pipe]] in the inventory to create [[V's shield]].}}

===Basilisks in the Market===
'''Items required''': ''[[V's shield]], combat equipment, 2 [[keg of beer|kegs of beer]] (If you forgot to buy them at the quest start, buy them from [[Rasolo]] or on the [[Grand Exchange]]. [[Keg of beer]] from the table in the [[Longhall]] does not work.)''
{{Checklist|
{{Instance}}
*Talk to [[Brundt]] southeast of Rellekka.
**If you destroyed your [[Seal of passage]] to return to Rellekka quickly, now is a good time to ask for another one {{Chat option|2Ask about a Seal of Passage.}} and then talk to Brundt again.
*Return to the [[Longhall]] and talk to [[Brundt]] again.
*Wield [[V's shield]] and fight the basilisks until you reach 100%. You have to hit a basilisk at least once to make its death count towards completion.
**[[Monstrous Basilisk (The Fremennik Exiles)|Monstrous Basilisk]] (level 135) counts for 10% completion.
**[[Basilisk]] (level 61) counts for 3.33% completion.
*Travel on the Fremennik Boat to the [[Island of Stone]].
}}

===Island of Stone===
'''Items required''': ''[[V's shield]], combat equipment to fight [[Typhor]] (level 218) and [[The Jormungand]] (level 363), a one handed weapon '''(must wield [[V's shield]])'''''

'''Recommended:''' ''1-2 [[super restore(4)]], high-healing [[food]]. Leaf-bladed battleaxe, [[dragon mace]], or a [[dragon warhammer]] are good weapon choices as the monster is weak to crush. Note that the [[dwarven helmet]] provides the highest crush boost of all helmets, however its defences are less than that of the [[helm of Neitiznot]].''
{{Checklist|
*Speak with [[Brundt]] to explain the cave door puzzle.
*Solve the cave door puzzle ([[Wikipedia:Mastermind (board game)|Mastermind]]).
**Each red check means one rune is correct but in the wrong position.
**Each green check means one rune is correct and in the right position.
{{Instance|irs=Brundt the Chieftain|cost=50000}}
*Equip V's shield and keep it equipped for the full fight.
*Enter the cave.
*Fight [[Typhor]] (level 218)
**Pray against either [[Protect from Magic|Magic]] or [[Protect from Melee|Melee]], depending on which attack style you are weaker against.
*There is a checkpoint after Typhor is defeated. You may wish to teleport out between fights to resupply. If you do, you can return to the Island of Stone by talking to [[Haskell]] on the western-most pier in Rellekka (the same one the Waterbirth Island boat is on)
*Fight [[The Jormungand]] (level 363). There are two special attacks to avoid:
**When the screen turns red, click to face away from the attack (hits around 40 damage and drains your stats a little).
**When frozen in rock, click repeatedly to break free.
**Pray [[Protect from Magic]].
**It is weak to [[crush]] attacks.
}}
